001import javax.swing.JFrame;
002import javax.swing.JTextField;
003import javax.swing.JTextArea;
004import javax.swing.JLabel;
005import javax.swing.JPanel;
006import javax.swing.JScrollPane;
007import javax.swing.ImageIcon;
008import java.awt.BorderLayout;
009import java.awt.Dimension;
010import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
011import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
012import java.awt.event.WindowAdapter;
013import java.awt.event.WindowEvent;
014import javax.swing.*;
015import java.awt.*;
016import java.awt.event.*;
017import java.net.URL;
018
019/**
020 * Cette classe implémente une interface utilisateur graphique simple avec 
021 * une zone de saisie de texte, une zone de sortie de texte et une image 
022 * optionnelle.
023 * 
024 * @author Clément RUAN
025 * @version 17/12/2025
026 */
027public class UserInterface implements ActionListener
028{
029    /**
030     * Moteur du jeu
031     */
032    private GameEngine aEngine;
033    /**
034     * Fenêtre principal du jeu
035     */
036    private JFrame aMyFrame;
037    /**
038     * Champ de saisie de texte
039     */
040    private JTextField aEntryField;
041    /**
042     * Zone d'affichage du texte ou historique du jeu
043     */
044    private JTextArea aLog;
045    /**
046     * Affichage de l'image
047     */
048    private JLabel aImage;
049    /**
050     * Bouton pour afficher les commandes disponible
051     */
052    private JButton aHelpButton;
053    /**
054     * Bouton pour afficher les différentes descriptions de la pièce actuelle
055     */
056    private JButton aLookButton;
057    /**
058     * Bouton pour quitter le jeu
059     */
060    private JButton aQuitButton;
061    /**
062     * Bouton pour revenir à la pièce précédente
063     */
064    private JButton aBackButton;
065    /**
066     * Bouton pour regarder à l'inventaire du joueur
067     */
068    private JButton aInventoryButton;
069
070    /**
071     * Construct a UserInterface. As a parameter, a Game Engine
072     * (an object processing and executing the game commands) is
073     * needed.
074     * 
075     * @param pGameEngine  The GameEngine object implementing the game logic.
076     */
077    public UserInterface( final GameEngine pGameEngine )
078    {
079        this.aEngine = pGameEngine;
080        this.createGUI();
081    } // UserInterface(.)
082
083    /**
084     * Print out some text into the text area.
085     * 
086     * @param pText Le texte affiché
087     */
088    public void print( final String pText )
089    {
090        this.aLog.append( pText );
091        this.aLog.setCaretPosition( this.aLog.getDocument().getLength() );
092    } // print(.)
093
094    /**
095     * Print out some text into the text area, followed by a line break.
096     * 
097     * @param pText Le texte affiché
098     */
099    public void println( final String pText )
100    {
101        this.print( pText + "\n" );
102    } // println(.)
103
104    /**
105     * Show an image file in the interface.
106     * 
107     * @param pImageName Chemin du ficher de l'image
108     */
109    public void showImage( final String pImageName )
110    {
111        String vImagePath = "" + pImageName; // to change the directory
112        URL vImageURL = this.getClass().getClassLoader().getResource( vImagePath );
113        if ( vImageURL == null )
114            System.out.println( "Image not found : " + vImagePath );
115        else {
116            ImageIcon vIcon = new ImageIcon( vImageURL );
117            this.aImage.setIcon( vIcon );
118            this.aMyFrame.pack();
119        }
120    } // showImage(.)
121
122    /**
123     * Enable or disable input in the entry field.
124     * 
125     * @param pOnOff True active les entrées, False désactive
126     */
127    public void enable( final boolean pOnOff )
128    {
129        this.aEntryField.setEditable( pOnOff );// enable/disable
130        this.aHelpButton.setEnabled( pOnOff );
131        this.aLookButton.setEnabled( pOnOff );
132        this.aBackButton.setEnabled( pOnOff );
133        this.aInventoryButton.setEnabled( pOnOff );
134        this.aQuitButton.setEnabled( pOnOff );
135        if ( pOnOff ) { // enable
136            this.aEntryField.getCaret().setBlinkRate( 500 ); // cursor blink
137            this.aEntryField.addActionListener( this ); // reacts to entry
138        }
139        else { // disable
140            this.aEntryField.getCaret().setBlinkRate( 0 ); // cursor won't blink
141            this.aEntryField.removeActionListener( this ); // won't react to entry
142        }
143    } // enable(.)
144
145    /**
146     * Set up graphical user interface.
147     */
148    private void createGUI()
149    {
150        this.aMyFrame = new JFrame( "The Steles of Antevia" ); // change the title !
151        this.aEntryField = new JTextField( 34 );
152
153        this.aLog = new JTextArea();
154        this.aLog.setEditable( false );
155        JScrollPane vListScroller = new JScrollPane( this.aLog );
156        vListScroller.setPreferredSize( new Dimension(100, 100) );
157        vListScroller.setMinimumSize( new Dimension(50,50) );
158        
159        // Ajouts des boutons
160        this.aImage = new JLabel();
161        this.aHelpButton = new JButton("Help");
162        this.aBackButton = new JButton("Back");
163        this.aLookButton = new JButton("Look");
164        this.aQuitButton = new JButton("Quit");
165        this.aInventoryButton = new JButton("Inventory");
166        
167        // Écouteurs sur les boutons
168        this.aHelpButton.addActionListener( this );
169        this.aBackButton.addActionListener( this );
170        this.aLookButton.addActionListener( this );
171        this.aQuitButton.addActionListener( this );
172        this.aInventoryButton.addActionListener( this );
173        
174        // Pour organiser les boutons
175        JPanel vButtonPanel = new JPanel();
176        vButtonPanel.setLayout(new GridLayout(3,2));
177        vButtonPanel.add(this.aHelpButton);
178        vButtonPanel.add(this.aBackButton);
179        vButtonPanel.add(this.aLookButton);
180        vButtonPanel.add(this.aInventoryButton);
181        vButtonPanel.add(this.aQuitButton);
182
183        JPanel vPanel = new JPanel();
184        vPanel.setLayout( new BorderLayout() ); // ==> only five places
185        vPanel.add( this.aImage, BorderLayout.NORTH );
186        vPanel.add( vListScroller, BorderLayout.CENTER );
187        vPanel.add( this.aEntryField, BorderLayout.SOUTH );
188        vPanel.add( vButtonPanel, BorderLayout.EAST ); // Place les boutons à droite 
189
190        this.aMyFrame.getContentPane().add( vPanel, BorderLayout.CENTER );
191
192        // add some event listeners to some components
193        this.aEntryField.addActionListener( this );
194
195        // to end program when window is closed
196        this.aMyFrame.addWindowListener(
197            new WindowAdapter() { // anonymous class
198                @Override public void windowClosing(final WindowEvent pE)
199                {
200                    System.exit(0);
201                }
202        } );
203
204        this.aMyFrame.pack();
205        this.aMyFrame.setVisible( true );
206        this.aEntryField.requestFocus();
207    } // createGUI()
208
209    /**
210     * Actionlistener interface for entry textfield.
211     */
212    @Override public void actionPerformed( final ActionEvent pE ) 
213    {
214        // no need to check the type of action at the moment
215        // because there is only one possible action (text input) :
216        String vCommand = pE.getActionCommand();
217        
218        if (vCommand.equals("Help"))
219        {
220            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("help");
221        } 
222        else if (vCommand.equals("Back"))
223        {
224            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("back");
225        } 
226        else if (vCommand.equals("Look"))
227        {
228            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("look");
229        } 
230        else if (vCommand.equals("Inventory"))
231        {
232            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("inventory");
233        } 
234        else if (vCommand.equals("Quit"))
235        {
236            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("quit");
237        } 
238        else 
239        {
240            this.processCommand(); // never suppress this line
241        }
242    } // actionPerformed(.)
243
244    /**
245     * A command has been entered in the entry field.  
246     * Read the command and do whatever is necessary to process it.
247     */
248    private void processCommand()
249    {
250        String vInput = this.aEntryField.getText();
251        this.aEntryField.setText( "" );
252
253        this.aEngine.interpretCommand( vInput );
254    } // processCommand()
255} // UserInterface 
256
